title: 02/21/22 DPS Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason McIntyre Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/21/22 DPS Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason McIntyre Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Jason address the stories that FSR colleague Rich Ohrnberger broke through his social media about Pat Mahomes's family and Tom Brady's alleged rift with Bruce Arians and his OC Byron Leftwich in Tampa. The guys welcome basketball analyst for Stadium Jeff Goodman on the show to talk about the melee in Wisconsin yesterday started when Michigan head coach Juwan Howard slapped a Wisconsin assistant in the handshake line.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Doug and Jason address the stories that FSR colleague Rich Ohrnberger broke through his social media about Pat Mahomes's family and Tom Brady's alleged rift with Bruce Arians and his OC Byron Leftwich in Tampa. The guys welcome basketball analyst for Stadium Jeff Goodman on the show to talk about the melee in Wisconsin yesterday started when Michigan head coach Juwan Howard slapped a Wisconsin assistant in the handshake line.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
